summary: Koozie Group and IMAGEN Brands, promotional products suppliers, released their 2022 corporate social responsibility report, highlighting their commitment to sustainability and charitable giving. title: Koch Industries Earns 2023 ENERGY STAR Partner of the Year Award for Energy Management - PR Newswire
summary: Koch Industries has been recognized by the EPA with the ENERGY STAR® Partner of the Year Award for 2023, marking their third consecutive win and fourth overall. The company has implemented various energy-efficiency initiatives across its facilities, resulting in significant reductions in energy consumption and waste production, as well as investments in renewable energy sources like solar power plants.

title: Digitalizing Manufacturing: 27th Annual ARC 2023 Industry Forum in Orlando - Automation.com
summary: The 27th Annual ARC Industry Forum in Orlando, Florida focused on digitalizing manufacturing. The forum highlighted how companies are transitioning from siloed organizations to unified teams achieving common goals through digitalization. Key takeaways include the importance of user experience, empowering employees with technology, integrating siloed information, and leveraging open standards for greater communication and data sharing.

title: Revisiting Circular Economy in 2023 - United Nations Development Programme
summary: The UNDP Pacific Office in Fiji is working with local communities to combat plastic pollution by promoting circular economy models. These models involve collecting and repurposing plastic waste, reducing the environmental impact of single-use plastics, and creating more sustainable pathways for waste management. This initiative aims to address the plastic pollution crisis in the Pacific region and create economic opportunities while safeguarding marine ecosystems.
product_or_process: Circular economy models for plastic waste management

title: What you need to know about the Species Recovery Programme Capital Grant scheme - Natural England
summary: Natural England is launching a new capital grant scheme, the Species Recovery Programme Capital Grant Scheme (SRPCGS), which aims to fund projects that enhance or create heritage assets that benefit species recovery. The scheme is open to partnerships, individual organizations, and businesses and will run over two financial years, with grant requests ranging from £50,000 to £500,000. Eligible activities include habitat enhancement, site infrastructure purchase, conservation translocations, and enabling activities to bring capital assets to a usable state.
product_or_process: Species Recovery Programme Capital Grant Scheme (SRPCGS)

title: Top 10 Best Organic Agriculture Companies In USA In 2023 - Inventiva
summary: Organic agriculture is gaining popularity in the US, with companies like Organic Valley, WhiteWave Foods, and Stonyfield Farm leading the way. These companies focus on producing high-quality organic products while employing sustainable practices, such as using renewable energy and reducing their environmental impact. Organic agriculture offers a growing market and a focus on providing consumers with healthy and environmentally conscious options.
